description: Saber, a telegram Anime userbot with MongoDB database

SESSION.description: Get this value by running [python3 mysession.py] in Termux or local system.

MONGO_URI.description: This is for the database account, you can obtain it from mongodb.com.

HEROKU_API.description: Your heroku api key if using heroku.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your heroku app name if using heroku.

BOT_LIST.description: List id of bot for trigger autoprotecc, separate by space.

LOG_CHAT.description: A private group id to store your logs.
